reviewText: purchased for my grandson and he loves it....thanks

If you are purchasing this for a child be aware there is adult content. Within the first few seconds you will see a lot of boobage, clevage and women in bikinis. The camera man focuses on women's boobs as they bounce up and down when they walk. I haven't watched the whole thing so I don't know what else you might see. For an adult and you want to see this action this is for you. I bought this for my 2 year old grandson who loves mud trucks and mud bogging. This was not appropriate for his little eyes.
I don't know what this movie is like, because it was a gift purchase for my grandson. He likes it though!
